name: Gold
title: Increase participation and basic brand validation

subItems.comment: Require creatives to agree to a Non Disclosure Agreement before participating in your contest. Your contest details will also be hidden from search engines
Receive priority project listing so your project stands out and gets more participation.

name: Platinum
title: Work with top-level creatives, plus agency-style brand validation

subItems.comment: Require creatives to agree to a Non Disclosure Agreement before participating in your contest. Your contest details will also be hidden from search engines
Only work with top creatives who have achieved high quality ranking on Atom
You can require creatives to agree to a Non Disclosure Agreement before participating in your contest. Plus, your contest is hidden from search engines
Receive priority project listing so your project stands out and receive more participation. We will also announce the launch of your project to our entire community via email.
Invite your team members to co-manage your contest

name: Managed
title: A full agency experience without the agency price tag

items.text: Receive optimum results from your Naming Contest by launching a Managed Contest Package and working one-on-one with an experienced Atom Branding Consultant.

With significantly more validation services available, professional brief creation, and daily management of your contest by your Branding Expert, you'll receive an enhanced branding experience to closeout your branding project.
